newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Maxtel six-month turnover surges.
newsitem.headline: Maxtel six-month turnover surges.

text.p: Half year ended December 31, 1996, vs 12 months to June 30, 1996.

NOTE - The company said in the light of continuing changes in the telecommunications marketplace, it has embarked on an exercise to refocus the company to take advantage of the emerging convergence pf telecommunications, information technology, Media (including broadcasting) and entertainment.
The exceptional item was the company's listing expenses.
